GHOST.name: Ghost
GHOST.description: Undetectable by UAVs, Portable Radars and Heartbeat Sensors

HIGH_ALERT.name: High Alert
HIGH_ALERT.description: Vision pulses when spotted by an enemy player outside of view

QUICK_FIX.name: Quick Fix
QUICK_FIX.description: Killing players or inserting a plate immediately start health regeneration. Capturing and holding objectives increases the player's health regeneration rate

SURVIVOR.name: Survivor
SURVIVOR.description: Enemies that down you get automatically pinged. Get revived faster by allies

BIRDSEYE.name: Birdseye
BIRDSEYE.description: UAV and radar pings reveal the enemy's direction
